View on GitHub

KGQA-leaderboard

Repository to track the progress in Question Answering over Knowledge Graphs (KGQA), including the datasets and the current state-of-the-art for the most common KGQA tasks.

SimpleDBpediaQA

SimpleDBpediaQA[1] is a dataset of SimpleQuestions mapped from Freebase to DBpedia.

This dataset can be downloaded via the link.

Leaderboard

References

[1] Michael Azmy, Peng Shi, Ihab Ilyas, and Jimmy Lin. Farewell Freebase: Migrating the SimpleQuestions Dataset to DBpedia. Proceedings of the 27th International Conference on Computational Linguistics (COLING 2018), pages 2093-2103, August 2018, Santa Fe, New Mexico.
